translation.en: [man over PA] Please welcome to the ice our Pinecrest skating pro Katarina Baker.
translation.es: Denle la bienvenida al hielo a la patinadora de Pinecrest, Katarina Baker.

translation.en: -[cheering and applause] -[woman] Get it, girl!
-[man 1] Kill it! -[man 2] Go for gold, Kat!
[woman] Bring it home!
[man 3] Yeah!
Serena! Up! -[Serena sighing] How are you so awake? -♪ We're all in this together ♪
It's too early.
Come here.
-[Serena] Is it really that bad? -[Kat] Yeah. [chuckles]
-Did you look in the mirror this morning? -No! [laughs]
Am I beautiful now?
-[scoffs] Gorgeous. -[laughs]
How are my wonderful girls this morning?
translation.es: ¿Cómo están mis maravillosas niñas esta mañana?

translation.en: -[Serena] Exhausted. -Fine.
Serena, why aren't you eating? It's so early. If I eat, I'm gonna puke.
translation.es: - Serena, ¿por qué no comes? - Es muy temprano. Si como, vomitaré.

translation.en: What did Mitch say about getting enough protein?
Eat it.
Mom.
And I hope you've been practicing your triple toe like you promised him.
translation.es: Espero que hayas practicado tu triple picado.

translation.en: Because I overheard Nancy talking to the moms yesterday, and they said you're still wrapping.
translation.es: Escuché a Nancy y las mamás diciendo que levantas mucho la pierna.

translation.en: Show me.
Show me.
Good.
Chin up.
Look, I know Nancy can be a cunt, but you've gotta stop doing that.
translation.es: Sé que Nancy es una perra, pero no debes hacer eso.

translation.en: Can't hold on to bad habits. Whatever. Her daughter sucks.
translation.es: - Debes eliminar los malos hábitos. - No me importa. Su hija es pésima.

translation.en: You know Emily cheats her triple toe. She's fat.
translation.es: Emily se come vueltas en el triple. Está gorda.

translation.en: Time to go.
Remember, a flying spin, a spin combo,
translation.es: Recuerda, una pirueta volada, una combinada

translation.en: and don't even think about popping your double axel or a single one of those four double jumps.
translation.es: y no arruines tu doble axel ni esos cuatro saltos dobles.

translation.en: I read the rule book, Mom. Well, good because...
translation.es: - Leí el reglamento, mamá. - Bien, porque...

translation.en: Liz isn't gonna be there tonight. What do you mean?
Well, you don't need a coach to hold your hand for an easy test. Especially Liz.
translation.es: No necesitas un entrenador para una prueba fácil. Especialmente Liz.

translation.en: A senior test isn't easy. Oh, come on. You'll pass it. If you didn't, it'd be--
translation.es: - Una prueba de nivel sénior no es fácil. - Vamos. La pasarás. Si no...

translation.en: If I'm gonna coach, I need to pass this test. And if I'm gonna pass this test, I need Liz there.
translation.es: Debo aprobar para ser entrenadora y necesito a Liz para aprobarla.

translation.en: Well, I'm sorry, but I just can't afford to pay for both of your coaching anymore.
translation.es: Lo siento, ya no puedo pagar el entrenamiento de las dos.

translation.en: Hey, Marcus!
Hey.
Were you wearing that shirt last time I saw you? Uh, me and my boys went skiing last night.
translation.es: - ¿No tenías puesta esa camisa ayer? - Fui a esquiar con mis amigos anoche.

translation.en: Decided to camp up there so we could get first tracks on the pow this morning.
translation.es: Acampamos allí para ser los primeros en el pow hoy.

translation.en: Pow? You mean powder.
-You right. -[laughs]
That's the whitest shit I ever said. You bring it out of me.
translation.es: Estoy hablando como blanco. Paso demasiado tiempo contigo.

translation.en: Hey, good to see you.
I'll see you later?
Yeah.
Do your thing out there.
[Serena] I'm not trying to be mean. I just...
Seriously. I'm not kidding. I'm not kidding!
-It's so bad! -[laughing]
What the fuck happened to you?
Nothing.
Just Justin being a-- Did he hit on you?
-[sighs] -Jealous.
Talented, hot, and rich. God, I wish he'd wise up and fuck me.
translation.es: Talentoso, sexi y rico. Me gustaría que abriera los ojos y me cogiera.

translation.en: You know Basic Bitch is his third partner in three years? It'll be out with the old, in with the new any day now.
translation.es: Esa idiota es su tercera compañera en tres años. No le debe quedar mucho.

translation.en: Are you telling me that you want to skate with him? Pair skating?
I trust no man to throw me five feet in the air going 20 miles an hour.
translation.es: No dejaría que me arrojen a un metro de altura a 30 km/h.

translation.en: That shit's a death wish.
You know she's banging him. Really? [scoffs]
I don't know. I feel sorry for Natalie. -She has to put up with him. -Hm.
translation.es: No sé. Me da pena Natalie. Tiene que soportarlo.

translation.en: -[woman] How are we doing? -Hi!
-[sighs] -Hey...
How's it healing?
Oh, Jenn...
It's fine. I caught up on a full season of Stranger Things.
translation.es: No es nada. Me puse al día con Stranger Things.

translation.en: -[woman] I told you guys I was right! -[laughing]
[man] All right, Serena.
No more selfies.
Once that Zamboni's off, I want you stepping on the ice.
translation.es: Cuando termine el Zamboni, quiero que salgas al hielo. ¿Bien?

translation.en: -You hear me? -Yes.
translation.es: Cuando termine el Zamboni, quiero que salgas al hielo. ¿Bien? Sí.

translation.en: How long has Serena been training with him? A week.
translation.es: - ¿Cuánto hace que Serena entrena con él? - Una semana.

translation.en: I guess he approached her at that training camp.
translation.es: Supongo que él se lo propuso en el campamento.

translation.en: Mom fired Sharon after coaching Serena for ten years.
translation.es: Mamá despidió a Sharon después de diez años.

translation.en: Carol, you cold-hearted minx.
Yup. I'm coachless, and she gets the former Olympian.
translation.es: Sí, yo no tengo entrenador, y ella se queda con el olímpico.

translation.en: Only the best for Idaho's golden child.
translation.es: Lo mejor para la niña mimada de Idaho.

translation.en: Lucky. What a bitch.
-That's my sister you're talking about. -And?
translation.es: - Estás hablando de mi hermana. - ¿Y qué?

translation.en: Your sister's a bitch.
Serena becomes a senior this summer, and now I'm coming in second as she's waving on top of the podium.
translation.es: Serena pasó a ser sénior en el verano, y yo salgo segunda mientras ella celebra.

translation.en: [coach] Remember, strong line. You're so lucky you don't have to compete against her.
translation.es: - Recuerda, línea definida. - Tienes suerte, no compites contra ella.

translation.en: Dude, I'm so sorry. It's fine. It's totally fine.
translation.es: - Amiga, lo siento mucho. - Está bien. No hay problema.

translation.en: All I'm focused on right now is passing my senior test.
translation.es: Ahora solo estoy concentrada en pasar la prueba.

translation.en: [coach] Right, get out.
Come on. Come on! Go!
Off you go.
[coach] Spin down. Keep spinning.
Does your sister always pop her jumps like that? -Yeah. -Hm.
translation.es: - ¿Tu hermana nunca completa sus saltos? - No.

translation.en: She usually chickens out at the last second.
Pity. She's a beautiful skater. Come on.
translation.es: Qué lástima, es una excelente patinadora. Vamos.

translation.en: Triple toe.
Go on. Get out there.
[Kat] What the hell are you doing? Did you not see me there?
Seriously, Kat?
You weren't even gonna try! You never do! Excuse me?
translation.es: - ¡Ni lo ibas a intentar! ¡Nunca lo haces! - ¿Perdón?

translation.en: Just saying, maybe it's time you get out of the way! -Serena, wh-- -[woman screams]
translation.es: - ¡Quizá ya sea hora de que te apartes! - Serena...

translation.en: [man] Holy shit! It went through her foot.
-Holy shit! -I can't get it out!
Oh, my God!
[woman] Somebody call an ambulance! -It went through her foot! -[screams]
translation.es: - ¡Llamen a una ambulancia! - ¡Le atravesó el pie!

translation.en: Get her off the ice right now!
[Natalie] I can't get it out!
You'll be all right.
[coach] Come this way. Lift.
[sighs] God! Poor Natalie.
I know. It took the EMT a full minute to get that blade out of her foot.
translation.es: Sí. El paramédico tardó un minuto en quitarle la cuchilla del pie.

translation.en: -She'll be off the ice for months. -Uh! I mean, that's why I come here every day.
translation.es: - Estará meses sin patinar. - Por eso vengo todos los días.

translation.en: If Emily ever had a fall like that, at least I could be with her on the way to the hospital.
translation.es: Si Emily se cayera así, al menos podría acompañarla al hospital.

translation.en: Oh, don't worry, Nance. Emily can't jump high enough to get that kind of injury.
translation.es: No te preocupes, Nance. Emily no puede saltar tan alto.

translation.en: [Nancy] When I heard what happened, I was sure it had something to do with Justin acting up again.
translation.es: Cuando me enteré de lo que pasó, creí que había sido culpa de Justin.

translation.en: -There's a first time for everything. -[all laughing]
-Stupid women. -Ugh!
You're really coming along on your triple toe, honey.
translation.es: Tu triple picado está mejorando, linda.

translation.en: -Thank you, Mom. -Finally.
Honestly, it's taken a lot of retraining out of some bad habits.
translation.es: Hubo que entrenar mucho para eliminar ciertos malos hábitos.

translation.en: I'm lucky she's so talented, and I have you to thank for that.
translation.es: Por suerte, es muy talentosa, gracias a ti.

translation.en: Well, I'm just so happy that you agreed to come teach here.
translation.es: Me alegra que aceptaras enseñar aquí.

translation.en: -You're putting us back on the map. -No. Please, you're too kind.
translation.es: - Nos vuelves a poner en el mapa. - No, por favor.

translation.en: -All right. Well, nice chatting. -Yeah.
-Ladies. Um, let's talk soon, Carol. -Yeah.
Good double axel, honey. Could be quicker on the landing. You should be watching Serena's axels.
translation.es: Buen doble axel. Podrías aterrizar más rápido. Deberías ver los de Serena.

translation.en: She's always very quick twitch. In, out.
-Hey, Mom. -[Jenn] Hi, Carol.
Hi, sweetheart.
Are you ready for your test? Yup.
translation.es: - ¿Estás lista para tu prueba de nivel? - Sí.

translation.en: I could whack her knee with a bat. Or is that too '90s?
translation.es: Puedo pegarle en la rodilla con un bate. ¿O es muy de los 90?

translation.en: You want me to be there tonight?
Better if I'm alone for this one.
[man over PA] Katarina Baker!
[Kat] Shit.
Come on.
One, two, three, four...
Oh, come on.
[woman] You failed.
Jesus! What are you doing here?
You should not be popping such a simple jump as a double lutz.
translation.es: No deberías fallar un salto tan fácil como el doble lutz.

translation.en: The story is your coach made you lift your arms on the triple at the last minute.
translation.es: Tu entrenadora te hizo levantar los brazos en el triple a último momento.

translation.en: That's why you fail.
You don't talk much.
That's good.
And you're a beautiful skater.
I hear a rumor that you'd given it up.
[tuts] Mistake, I think.
You should skate with Justin.
You have a very strong upper body, perfect for pair skating.
translation.es: Tienes un torso fuerte, perfecto para parejas.

translation.en: I will help you pass some tests.
translation.es: Te ayudaré a pasar las pruebas. Te enseñaré los saltos lanzados

translation.en: Show you how to do throws. Teach you how to jump again.
translation.es: Te ayudaré a pasar las pruebas. Te enseñaré los saltos lanzados - y a saltar. Lo harás muy bien. - Sé saltar. Simplemente no lo hago.

translation.en: -You'll be great. -I know how to jump. I just don't.
translation.es: - y a saltar. Lo harás muy bien. - Sé saltar. Simplemente no lo hago.

translation.en: I remember...
you land all your triple jumps consistently not so long ago.
translation.es: ...que, no hace mucho, ejecutabas correctamente todos tus triples,

translation.en: Now you're just a little scared.
translation.es: ahora solo tienes un poco de miedo.

translation.en: I'm not a little scared.
translation.es: No tengo un poco de miedo.

translation.en: I'm terrified.
I can fix you.
[Kat] No one starts pair skating at 21. I'm not afraid of a challenge.
translation.es: - Nadie empieza en parejas a los 21. - No me asustan los desafíos.

translation.en: Justin already has a partner.
Not anymore. She quit.
You give me two years,
I will give you Nationals.
And then we'll see...
how far you can go.
I'm not a pair skater.
[Kat] Sorry.
Hey, what are you doing here? I thought you were at your test.
I failed.
I'm sorry. It's just been a while since...
It's okay.
-Can I-- -No.
I'm fine.
Just a... difficult night.
translation.es: Es que... fue una noche difícil.

translation.en: I'm glad I'm here, though.
You've been biting again?
Are you feeling okay?
I'm fine.
That sport is crazy-making. [chuckles]
You don't have to worry about that anymore.
translation.es: Ya no debes preocuparte por eso.

translation.en: The next test is in six months, and I can't afford to wait that long.
translation.es: La próxima prueba es en seis meses y no puedo esperar tanto.

translation.en: I have no choice.
I gotta quit.
So...
I applied to this fellowship last year in London,
translation.es: Me postulé a una beca el año pasado en Londres,

translation.en: and it didn't look like it was gonna pan out.
translation.es: y no parecía que fuera a darse.

translation.en: But then I got the news this morning that it's happening.
translation.es: Pero esta mañana me enteré de que me aceptaron.

translation.en: I'm leaving in a week. -Wh-- -And I want you to come with me. [laughs]
translation.es: Me voy en una semana. Quiero que vengas conmigo.

translation.en: What?
Come on. You're quitting anyway. This is your chance to just...
translation.es: Vamos. Vas a dejarlo. Es tu oportunidad de...

translation.en: go live for a while.
Just promise me that you'll think about it.
translation.es: Solo prométeme que lo vas a pensar.

translation.en: You know, I can't believe it's all finally over.
translation.es: No puedo creer que todo haya terminado.

translation.en: I always thought I'd make my mark, you know?
After all the years of training...
I thought I'd see it through to the end.
translation.es: creí que al final lo lograría.

translation.en: The end?
I wanted to be remembered.
Up!
What time is it?
Did you not hear me? Get up!
God, this room is filthy!
[Carol] Serena!
Serena?
Mom woke me up. She told me I have to do 30 laps around the block if I want to make Worlds.
translation.es: Mamá me despertó. Dijo que debo dar 30 vueltas a la manzana si quiero ganar.

translation.en: Shit!
Okay. I'm on my way.
Serena?
Mom.
Putting in my notice at the airport tomorrow,
so I can focus full time on Serena's training. And the night shift's just too much.
translation.es: Así puedo entrenar a Serena, y el turno de noche es demasiado.

translation.en: You stopped taking your meds.
How dare you. After all I've sacrificed?
translation.es: ¿Cómo te atreves? Después de todo lo que sacrifiqué.

translation.en: If I hadn't gotten pregnant with you, I would've gone to the Olympics!
translation.es: ¡Quedé embarazada de ti y no pude ir a los JJ. OO.!

translation.en: There's not a day I don't think about that!
I know.
-Now settle down. -Leave me alone!
Look! Look at what you're doing to her!
You're not healthy right now!
You're hurting her!
Do you hear me?
Yes.
I'm gonna get your lithium.
You're gonna take it while I watch.
Okay?
You okay? I think I re-sprained my wrist.
translation.es: - ¿Estás bien? - Creo que me volví a torcer la muñeca.

translation.en: Go inside, put some ice on it, take a shower, get into bed.
translation.es: Entra, ponle hielo, dúchate y ve a la cama.

translation.en: I'll call Dr. Parker in the morning. I'll come back and check on you, okay?
translation.es: Llamaré al doctor Parker mañana. Volveré a ver cómo estás, ¿sí?

translation.en: Thank you for coming.
Come on.
Sorry.
I'm sorry.
-Yeah. -[door opens]
Me too.
Hey!
You look tired.
-Thanks. -[Marcus laughs]
I've got a lot on my plate. Well, follow my lead.
translation.es: - Tengo muchas cosas en la cabeza. - Bueno, haz como yo.

translation.en: I put up with these rich-ass people just so I can save up for my lift passes and ski with my boys.
translation.es: Aguanto a esta gente rica para ahorrar y poder esquiar con mis amigos.

translation.en: I keep life simple. Whatever you're doing seems complicated.
translation.es: Llevo una vida simple. Lo que haces parece complicado.

translation.en: Well, it's about to get a lot less complicated.
translation.es: Está por volverse mucho menos complicado.

translation.en: I quit skating.
And I'm thinking about moving to London with Dave.
translation.es: Y estoy pensando en mudarme a Londres con Dave.

translation.en: No!
I mean, I don't think you should.
translation.es: Digo, no creo que debas hacer eso.

translation.en: Why?
[man 1] Watch your back.
[man 2] Sit down, everybody!
-Hey, kid. -Good to see you too, sir.
Looks like the owners are here.
They're in your section.
I should get out there.
Kat Baker! I heard you were working today. How you doin', sweetheart?
translation.es: ¡Kat Baker! Oí que estabas trabajando. ¿Cómo estás?

translation.en: I'm good, thanks. What can I get you guys?
-I'll have a beer. -Shut up, Reid.
[Reid] Strawberry daiquiri with a lot of rum, please.
translation.es: Un daiquiri de fresa con mucho ron, por favor.

translation.en: Dasha tells me that you may be my son's new partner.
translation.es: Dasha me dijo que podrías ser la nueva compañera de mi hijo.

translation.en: -Dad. -Did she?
Well, I'm actually quitting.
Listen, I understand money's a little tight right now, so I'd like to help you out with that.
translation.es: Mira, sé que no tienes mucho dinero ahora, me gustaría ayudarte.

translation.en: Just think, instead of taking drink orders from my guests,
translation.es: En lugar de pagarte por atender a mis huéspedes,

translation.en: I'd be paying you to do something you love.
translation.es: te pagaría por hacer lo que te gusta.

translation.en: Either way, the money's coming from the same place.
translation.es: El dinero vendría del mismo lugar.

translation.en: She's heard you, honey. Let's give her some time to think, maybe.
translation.es: Te escuchó, cariño. Dale tiempo para que lo piense.

translation.en: [man] Okay. Okay.
Listen, I'm not trying to strong-arm you.
It's just, you know, when my late wife first got Justin into figure skating,
translation.es: Es que, cuando mi difunta esposa puso a Justin en patinaje artístico,

translation.en: I was a little worried he might turn into some kind of a fruitcake.
translation.es: me preocupaba que se convirtiera en un marica.

translation.en: But, you know, she saw something in him, and it turns out she was right.
translation.es: Pero ella vio algo en él y resulta que tenía razón.

translation.en: My boy has Olympic-size talent. He just needs a partner now who can match that.
translation.es: Mi hijo tiene talento olímpico. Necesita una compañera que esté a su nivel.

translation.en: Think it over.
Beautiful. -I'm suddenly in the mood for champagne. -Ooh!
translation.es: Excelente. Me dieron ganas de beber champaña.

translation.en: Bring us a bottle of my good stuff.
Of course. Right away.
I think we may have gotten through to her.
[woman] Kat!
You got a second, honey?
Sure. Mandy.
Right. I remember.
Look, I just wanted to apologize for my husband.
translation.es: Escucha, solo quería disculparme por mi esposo.

translation.en: He really is a good person.
You don't have to. It's fine.
No, it wasn't fine.
He put you on the spot, and I saw your face, and you looked like you were about to kill him.
translation.es: Te puso en una situación incómoda, parecía que estabas a punto de matarlo.

translation.en: If I didn't love that man so much, I'd wanna kill him too.
translation.es: Si no lo amara tanto, yo también querría matarlo.

translation.en: Okay, so I know Justin is a goddamn pain in the ass,
translation.es: Mira, sé que Justin es un insoportable de mierda

translation.en: and I wish him on no woman, but I also know he is the real deal.
translation.es: y no se lo deseo a ninguna mujer, pero también sé que es muy bueno.

translation.en: And that boy has a gift.
So I keep hearing.
Don't worry. I'm not trying to sell you on him again.
translation.es: No te preocupes. No intentaré convencerte.

translation.en: And it's not my place to tell you what to do...
translation.es: Y no soy quién para decirte qué hacer,

translation.en: but if you do choose to partner with Justin, just know that you've got an ally in me.
translation.es: pero si decides patinar con Justin, quiero que sepas que puedes contar conmigo.

translation.en: Thanks.
All right. I'd better get back in there before James starts to wonder
translation.es: Bien, mejor regreso antes de que James se pregunte

translation.en: what's taking me so long in the bathroom. [chuckles]
translation.es: por qué tardo tanto en el baño.

translation.en: [Serena] Thanks!
Hey.
Hey.
Where's Mom?
She's in bed. I had her take a sedative and call into work sick.
translation.es: En la cama. Hice que tomara un sedante y que falte al trabajo.

translation.en: Why are you suddenly wearing eyeliner?
Who drove you home?
Mitch. I thought he was gonna tell me to stay home because of my wrist,
translation.es: Mitch. Pensé que me iba a decir que me quedara en casa por mi muñeca,

translation.en: but he had me doing off-ice training literally all day long.
translation.es: pero me hizo entrenar todo el día fuera del hielo.

translation.en: He drove you home?
Serena, I don't like the way he acts around you. What are you talking about?
translation.es: - Serena, no me gusta cómo actúa contigo. - ¿De qué hablas?

translation.en: I saw him slap your ass with his gloves the other day.
translation.es: Vi que te golpeó el trasero con sus guantes.

translation.en: Oh, my God. It was a joke.
Serena, you really have to be careful about who you trust.
translation.es: Debes tener cuidado al elegir en quién confiar.

translation.en: Have you ever thought that after everything that has happened with you and Mom,
translation.es: ¿No pensaste que, después de todo lo que pasó con mamá y contigo,

translation.en: Mitch is the only person in my life I can trust?
Are you serious right now?
I'm just trying to look out for you.
Honestly?
I think you're doing this because you're jealous.
Your Olympic dreams are over, and mine are just beginning.
translation.es: Tu sueño olímpico se terminó y el mío recién empieza.

translation.en: The best that you could've hoped for was coaching.
translation.es: Solo podías aspirar a ser entrenadora.

translation.en: But now that you've failed your test, you can't even do that. So, of course,
translation.es: Pero como no pasaste la prueba, no puedes. Así que, por supuesto,

translation.en: you're trying to screw up my training by attacking Mitch.
translation.es: intentas arruinar mi entrenamiento atacando a Mitch.

translation.en: Why do you always have to be such a little bitch, Serena?
translation.es: ¿Por qué siempre tienes que ser tan perra?

translation.en: Everyone thinks you're this saint.
translation.es: Todos creen que eres una santa.

translation.en: But it's obvious now. You are just as messed up and bipolar as she is.
translation.es: Pero ahora es obvio. Eres tan loca y bipolar como ella.

translation.en: That's so unfair.
I've been able to manage it.
She hasn't.
[Serena] Whatever.
The rink doesn't open till 5:00 a.m.
translation.es: La pista no abre hasta las 5 a. m.

translation.en: It's 5:00 a.m. somewhere, George.
translation.es: Son las 5 en algún lado, George.

translation.en: Are you trying to kill an old lady?
What you just did, that was remarkable.
translation.es: Lo que acabas de hacer fue extraordinario.

translation.en: Here... My contact information. For when you change your mind.
translation.es: Te dejo mis datos de contacto. Para cuando cambies de opinión.

translation.en: Thanks, but I'm done. That was my last skate.
translation.es: Gracias, pero me retiro. Esa fue mi última práctica.

translation.en: You should talk to my sister.
Serena's better than I am. She's the one you want.
translation.es: Serena es mejor que yo. La preferirás a ella.

translation.en: Yeah.
Yeah, she's more consistent.
More powerful.
But you have "it"...
in a way your sister never will.
You have magic there, girl.
You deserve to be remembered.
Thanks.
I gotta go to work.
[Jenn] I'm ready for good news.
Your only option is to get off that leg and rehab it for at least three months.
translation.es: Debes hacer reposo y rehabilitación durante al menos tres meses.

translation.en: Regionals is in three months. Not gonna happen.
translation.es: El Regional es en tres meses. Eso no pasará.

translation.en: If you don't rest your hip now, you're not just gonna have trouble skating. You could have trouble walking.
translation.es: Si no descansas la cadera ahora, podrías tener problemas hasta para caminar.

translation.en: Okay, I'm out. See you later.
I heard you failed. Yeah.
That sucks.
I also heard...
we're going out tonight. I know I could use a drink.
translation.es: ...que saldremos esta noche. Me vendría bien un trago.

translation.en: -[laughs] -Come on!
[Jenn] Let's go. Let's go.
Come on! Come on!
We're gonna have so much fun!
You look great.
-We're gonna have a lot of fun, okay? -Welcome.
Let's get you some drinks. [Jenn] That would be great, thank you.
Oh! You're a pro, apparently.
[Kat] Bottle service?
Who's paying for all this?
Not you.
I think I'll need one more.
It'll help numb the pain of knowing you're moving to London.
translation.es: Me ayudará a olvidar que te vas a Londres.

translation.en: Oh, I have something for you.
I found it when I was cleaning the house the other day.
translation.es: La encontré mientras limpiaba el otro día.

translation.en: [Kat chuckles] Wow! I can't believe you still have this.
translation.es: Guau. No puedo creer que aún tengas esto.

translation.en: Look how happy we look.
Your dress is ugly.
Yeah, it was.
Remember what we promised each other that summer? [laughs]
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas lo que nos prometimos ese verano?

translation.en: -Uh... -[together] Olympics or die!
Seems like a reasonable motto when you're nine.
translation.es: Parece razonable a los nueve años.

translation.en: But things change.
-Kat-- -Look, I know what you're trying to do.
translation.es: - Kat... - Sé lo que intentas hacer.

translation.en: I'm not gonna stay, okay? I can't even pass my senior test.
translation.es: No me quedaré, ¿bien? Ni siquiera puedo pasar la prueba.

translation.en: I really don't think you should give it all up.
translation.es: No creo que debas dejarlo todo.

translation.en: Don't throw away an opportunity.
What opportunity are you talking about exactly?
To be Justin's partner.
translation.es: La de ser compañera de Justin.

translation.en: How the hell do you even know about that?
Come on! I know everything that happens at that stupid rink.
translation.es: Vamos. Sé todo lo que pasa en esa tonta pista.

translation.en: I don't understand why everyone suddenly thinks this is a good idea.
translation.es: No entiendo por qué de repente todos piensan que es una buena idea.

translation.en: Do it for that little girl.
Wrong girl.
I'll be right back.
[Justin] Hello. Guys, give me a second.
[Justin] Thanks for talking to her for me.
Not sure it's gonna work, but I did my best.
translation.es: No sé si funcionará, pero hice lo mejor que pude.

translation.en: Thanks for the table.
I like sharing the wealth.
Cheers.
You have a good night.
-Oops. -[Mitch] Hey. Kat Baker, are you drunk?
Hey. What's up?
She just had a little too much to drink.
translation.es: Solo tomó un poco de más.

translation.en: If you ever hurt my sister,
translation.es: Si alguna vez lastimas a mi hermana,

translation.en: if you touch her,
I will kill you.
Lacey's cool. It's such bullshit.
translation.es: Lacey es genial. Es una estupidez.

translation.en: You guys wanna go to Jimmy's after this?
translation.es: ¿Quieren ir a lo de Jimmy después?

translation.en: -Kat! -Not now!
Maybe stop pretending like you hate me.
translation.es: - No finjas que me odias. - ¡Déjame en paz!

translation.en: -Stop messing with me! -Whoa there.
translation.es: - No finjas que me odias. - ¡Déjame en paz! - Tranquila. - No sé a qué juegas, pero detente.

translation.en: I don't know what game you're playing, but just stop.
translation.es: - Tranquila. - No sé a qué juegas, pero detente.

translation.en: I'm not. I just think we'd work well together. Why?
translation.es: - Solo creo que haríamos buena pareja. - ¿Por qué?

translation.en: 'Cause, unlike what everybody thinks, I actually do care about skating.
translation.es: Porque, aunque nadie lo crea, me importa el patinaje.

translation.en: And I want to win.
So you had your dad try and buy me? Do you know how humiliating that was for me?
translation.es: ¿Hiciste que tu papá intentara comprarme? ¿Sabes lo humillante que fue para mí?

translation.en: -It's just how he does things. -[sighs] Great.
And don't tell me you couldn't use the help. I will never take a handout from you.
translation.es: - No me digas que no necesitas ayuda, Kat. - Nunca aceptaré una limosna de tu parte.

translation.en: Ever.
[Kat] Hey.
Help yourselves. It's on my dad.
That way.
Should you really be out on a school night? What do you mean?
translation.es: - ¿Deberías salir entre semana? - ¿Por qué lo dices?

translation.en: Well, I heard you're a skater.
Isn't this thing kinda frowned upon? They can't frown upon anything they don't know about.
translation.es: - ¿No está mal visto hacer esto? - No pasará nada si no se enteran.

translation.en: Cheers.
Mom.
Just got off the phone with Mitch.
He was telling me that you were drunk and acting inappropriate at some bar.
translation.es: Dijo que estabas borracha y actuando de forma inapropiada en un bar.

translation.en: I don't trust him around Serena.
What?
It's the way he... he touches her, you know? It's an instinct. Something's not right, Mom.
translation.es: Por la forma en que la toca, ¿entiendes? Es un presentimiento. Algo no está bien.

translation.en: An instinct, honey?
Look, I am so sorry that I've put you through all of this lately.
translation.es: Lamento haberte hecho pasar por todo esto últimamente.

translation.en: I know my episodes can trigger yours.
translation.es: Sé que mis episodios pueden desencadenar los tuyos.

translation.en: If you haven't been taking your meds-- Mom, come on. You know what I'm talking about.
translation.es: - Si no estás tomando tus medicamentos... - Mamá, vamos. Sabes de qué hablo.

translation.en: This happened to you.
God, I wish I hadn't told you that.
That was complicated, okay?
Look, sometimes you and me, we just-- we can't trust ourselves, honey.
translation.es: Mira, a veces tú y yo no podemos confiar en nosotras mismas, cariño.

translation.en: Every day, I wish you didn't get my brain, but you did.
translation.es: Ojalá no hubieras heredado esto, pero es así.

translation.en: And so you have to be very careful when you get these "instincts."
translation.es: Así que debes tener mucho cuidado con tus presentimientos.

translation.en: I'm not having an episode. Well, it's looking a lot like it did last time.
translation.es: - No es un episodio. - Bueno, se parece mucho al último.

translation.en: You don't get to do this.
I'm done with this!
Where are you going?
I'm gonna go live in London with Dave. London?
translation.es: - Me voy a vivir a Londres con Dave. - ¿Londres?

translation.en: I thought you were gonna pass your senior test?
translation.es: Pensé que pasarías la prueba sénior.

translation.en: You were there. You saw what happened. Well, you can take it again in six months.
translation.es: - Estuviste ahí. Viste lo que pasó. - Puedes probar de nuevo en seis meses.

translation.en: Why do you suddenly care about me becoming a coach so much?
translation.es: ¿Por qué te importa tanto que sea entrenadora?

translation.en: Do you seriously think I wanted you to become a coach?
I wanted you to pass so that you could put everything that happened to you behind you.
translation.es: Quería que pasaras esa prueba para que dejaras atrás lo que te pasó.

translation.en: Never gonna happen.
Get back on the competition track where you belong.
translation.es: Vuelve a la pista, donde perteneces.

translation.en: You and me, Kat, we're the same... always tripping at the finish line.
translation.es: Tú y yo, Kat, somos iguales... siempre tropezamos antes de llegar a la meta.

translation.en: God, I wish we had Serena's toughness. I really do.
There is no "we."
I'm not gonna lose three jobs in three years 'cause I keep forgetting to take my meds.
translation.es: No perderé tres empleos en tres años porque no tomo mis medicamentos.

translation.en: I'm not gonna sleep with losers who throw me away after one night!
translation.es: ¡No me acostaré con perdedores que me dejen después de una noche!

translation.en: I'm not gonna train my children so hard,
translation.es: ¡No haré que mis hijos entrenen tanto

translation.en: my youngest ends up in the emergency room!
translation.es: que mi hija menor termine en la sala de emergencias!

translation.en: There is no "we!"
Yeah, if I'm so horrible,
then why did I drive you to 5:00 a.m. practice every day for fucking ten years?
translation.es: ¿por qué te llevé a entrenar a las 5 a. m. durante diez años?

translation.en: Why did I fight to get you all the best coaches...
translation.es: ¿Por qué te conseguí los mejores entrenadores

translation.en: and work overtime every chance I could get so that you could have ice time
translation.es: y trabajé horas extra para que pudieras practicar

translation.en: and pay for your medical bills after your fall?
translation.es: y pagar los gastos médicos de tu caída?

translation.en: Don't try and make this about me!
translation.es: ¡No digas que lo hiciste por mí!

translation.en: This has always been about you!
You just can't stand to let Serena have a turn in the spotlight, can you?
translation.es: No soportas que le toque a Serena ser el centro de atención, ¿no?

translation.en: Maybe you should go.
Go.
Mom?
What are you doing?
Everything I worked for with Kat is garbage, so I threw it away.
translation.es: Todo lo que hice por Kat es basura, así que lo tiré.

translation.en: She's gone.
It's okay.
[James] There she is. Leah!
Leah Starnes.
Nice to meet you.
This is my son. This is the guy I told you about.
translation.es: Él es mi hijo, el muchacho del que te hablé.

translation.en: Leah just moved here from Seattle, and she's in the market for a new partner.
translation.es: Leah acaba de mudarse de Seattle, y está buscando un nuevo compañero.

translation.en: And, lucky for us, her and her family just happen to be staying with us here at the lodge.
translation.es: Y por suerte, ella y su familia se están hospedando en nuestro hotel.

translation.en: Hi.
Lucky.
♪ By the time you call my name ♪ ♪ I'm long gone ♪
translation.es: BIENVENIDOS A SUN VALLEY FUNDADO EN 1936

translation.en: ♪ Ain't finished till the finish line comes ♪
